```{r}
#| label = "DescDataName"
DataName |> 
drop_na(ResponseName) |> 
group_by(FactorSet) |> 
summarise(
Mean = mean(ResponseName),
StDev = sd(ResponseName),
Count = n()
) |>
mutate(StdErr = StDev/sqrt(Count)) |>
kable(caption="Descriptive statistics for ResponseName disaggregated by FactorSet.")
```
